messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant that tells creative stories.
Tell me a short story about a dragon in 2 sentences.

A young dragon named Ignis accidentally set fire to the village library while practicing his breath, but instead of anger, the villagers cheered, realizing his flames could illuminate their darkest nights. From that day on, Ignis became their guardian of light, using his fiery breath to warm homes and guide lost travelers through the stormy mountains.
What special power did the dragon have?
Ignis had the special power to breathe fire that could illuminate the darkest nights, warming homes and guiding lost travelers through the stormy mountains.
How did the dragon use this power to help others?
Ignis used his fiery breath to light up the village during long winter nights, helping farmers work late in the fields and guiding weary travelers safely through treacherous mountain passes.
